Melee Weapon Attack:
 +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 
Hit:
 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

description:
Medium humanoid (any race), any non-good alignment
Cultists swear allegiance to dark powers such as elemental princes, demon lords, or archdevils. Most conceal their loyalties to avoid being
ostracized, imprisoned, or executed for their beliefs. Unlike evil acolytes, cultists often show signs of insanity in their beliefs and practices.

The cultist has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

name: Cultist
